remarks: Value of the multiplication operation of an opposite ring.  Hypotheses eliminated by a suggestion of Stefan O'Rear, 30-Aug-2015.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2015.)
statement:
opprval.1 $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
opprval.2 $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
opprval.3 $e |- O = ( oppR ` R ) $.
opprmulfval.4 $e |- .xb = ( .r ` O ) $.
opprmul $p |- ( X .xb Y ) = ( Y .x. X ) $.
